channel.title: 667 ObjectHandler Errors
channel.description:
Hey, I'm getting these errors in ObjectHandler..
[code]src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ObjectHandler.java:335: error: illegal start of expression public Player player, ^ src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ObjectHandler.java:335: error: <identifier> exp ected public Player player, ^ src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ObjectHandler.java:336: error: not a statement if (hatId == Runecrafting.EARTH_TIARA ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
When I change public Player player, to "private Player player," I get the same errors...
[code]src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ObjectHandler.java:335: error: illegal start of expression private Player player, ^ src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ObjectHandler.java:335: error: <identifier> exp ected private Player player, ^ src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ObjectHandler.java:336: error: not a statement if (hatId == Runecrafting.EARTH_TIARA ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
This is the ObjectHandler code:
http://pastebin.com/eMuefM7p
Any help would be appreciated.

item.title: 667 ObjectHandler Errors
item.dc:creator: @TeeBark TeeBark
item.description:
@TeeBark wrote:

Hey, I’m getting these errors in ObjectHandler…

src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ObjectHandler.java:335: error: illegal start of expression public Player player, ^ src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ObjectHandler.java:335: error: <identifier> exp ected public Player player, ^ src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ObjectHandler.java:336: error: not a statement if (hatId == Runecrafting.EARTH_TIARA ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

When I change public Player player, to “private Player player,” I get the same errors…

src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ObjectHandler.java:335: error: illegal start of expression private Player player, ^ src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ObjectHandler.java:335: error: <identifier> exp ected private Player player, ^ src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ObjectHandler.java:336: error: not a statement if (hatId == Runecrafting.EARTH_TIARA ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

This is the ObjectHandler code:

http://pastebin.com/eMuefM7p

Any help would be appreciated.
